"Mura": "I serve as one of Lady Nadereh's attendants. My name is Mura."
"Lady Nadereh is a very busy person, so please direct any inquiries you might have towards me and I'll be happy to help."
"I've heard of your deeds in Morava Canyon."
"We are very grateful for the assistance you have provided."
"Although she may not let it show, Lady Nadereh is also most pleased."
"But she hasn't stopped to rest, and continues to take command..."
"I'm worried for her. I wish she wouldn't push herself so..."
"You've come at a great time. I have something I'd like to ask of you."
"Are you familiar with the Photon Tuners? Yes, they're those devices that react to singing."
"They've been neglected for quite some time, so I'd like to check on them in each region..."
"I've sent you the coordinates of the Tuners that need investigating."
"There are several spots I'd like you to check. I know it's a lot, but I'm counting on you."
"I see, now must not be a good time. Please consider helping once you are free."
"The residents are slowly beginning to spend more time amidst music."
"I pray that we can return to the old days where everyone would sing and dance together."
